isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9200, 9300, 9400 Models Built After January 1, 1995 - ELECTRICAL TROUBLESHOOTING FANS - DESCRIPTION - CATERPILLAR 3176B, 3406E

svcsubproc.title: Horton Engine Fan Controls
svcsubproc.para: Refer to circuit diagram HORTON AND KYSOR ENGINE FAN W/CAT 3176B AND 3406E in CTS-5119S.
The ECM is used to control the Horton engine cooling fan. Other fan control components include:

item.para: A Normally Closed (N.C.) Air Conditioning (AC) High Pressure Switch (228).
A sealed N.O. Fan Solenoid relay (410).

svcsubproc.para: The Fan Solenoid relay is controlled by the ECM using information from the Coolant Temperature Sensor, Retarder Solenoid status and AC High Pressure switch.

svcsubproc.para: The ECM is used to control the Kysor engine cooling fan. Other fan control components include:

item.para: A Normally Closed (N.C.) Air Conditioning (AC) High Pressure Switch (228).

svcsubproc.para: The Solenoid relay is controlled by the ECM using information from the Coolant Temperature Sensor, Retarder Solenoid status and AC High Pressure switch.
